Touring Exhibitions

Touring Exhibitions is a compilation of exhibitions and activities produced or co-produced by the Museo Reina Sofía and displayed in different places around the world.

It also encompasses those exhibitions and activities organised by other institutions and shown in the Museo Reina Sofía.

Furthermore, it includes a section for travelling activities and exhibitions organised exclusively with works from the Museo’s own Collection.
